name: istanbul
comment: HF targeted for October 2019 following the Constantinople/Petersburg HF

blake2Round.d: Gas cost per round for the Blake2 F precompile

ecAdd.d: Gas costs for curve addition precompile

ecMul.d: Gas costs for curve multiplication precompile

ecPairing.d: Base gas costs for curve pairing precompile

ecPairingWord.d: Gas costs regarding curve pairing precompile input length

txDataNonZero.d: Per byte of data attached to a transaction that is not equal to zero. NOTE: Not payable on data of calls between transactions

sstoreSentry.d: Minimum gas required to be present for an SSTORE call, not consumed

sstoreNoop.d: Once per SSTORE operation if the value doesn't change

sstoreDirty.d: Once per SSTORE operation if a dirty value is changed

sstoreInit.d: Once per SSTORE operation from clean zero to non-zero

sstoreInitRefund.d: Once per SSTORE operation for resetting to the original zero value

sstoreClean.d: Once per SSTORE operation from clean non-zero to something else

sstoreCleanRefund.d: Once per SSTORE operation for resetting to the original non-zero value

sstoreClearRefund.d: Once per SSTORE operation for clearing an originally existing storage slot
